title: System Architect - Apple Vision Pro
summary: Apple is where individual imaginations gather together, committing to the values that lead to great work. Every new product we build, service we create, or Apple Store experience we deliver is the result of us making each other’s ideas stronger...
description: We are seeking a highly motivated, energetic System Architect to lead and drive system technical designs and roadmaps. You will oversee and analyze key system architectural and implementation trade-offs such as power and performance in a thermally constrained system, analyzing silicon, data flows and driving requirements...
preferred_qualifications: Proven expertise in SoC architecture, low-power design, HW/SW interfaces, bus protocols, and wireless interfaces. Working knowledge of HW/SW interaction, operating systems, estimation of compute workload, thermal and power controls in modern SoCs. Previous exposure to PCB technologies, signal integrity considerations, coex/desense mitigation. Working experience with complex systems containing motion sensing, computer vision and sensor fusion elements. Previous exposure to various display technologies (LCD, OLED, LBS) and associated optical systems
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $207,800 and $312,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs. Apple employees are eligible for discretionary restricted stock unit awards, and can purchase Apple stock at a discount if voluntarily participating in Apple’s Employee Stock Purchase Plan...
